title: Load PathIcon "data" from svg file added to project
body: Suggestion for Pathicon "DataUri Property" for loading PathIcon from a Svg File, instead of specifying messy vector strings, nobody really wanted to put this stuff ("F1 M 16,12 20,2L 20,16 1,16") in their xaml.  Example:

comments.body: I prefer if all "Path" Controls could load from svg rather than writing out ackward strings like "F1 M 16,12 20,2L 20,16 1,16".
